title: Citi Hires for Bond-Trading Desk as AI Drives Debt-Sales Boom
description: Citigroup Inc. is expanding the staff of its US investment-grade debt trading desk as it joins Wall Street banks preparing for a potential record-setting surge of corporate-bond sales next year due to the artificial-intelligence investment boom.

title: Apple AI chief leaving as iPhone maker plays catch-up
description: Apple on Monday said the head of its artificial intelligence team is stepping down, and the effort is to be led by a veteran engineer from Google and Microsoft. The plan for Apple senior vice president of Machine Learning and AI Strategy John Giannandrea to retire early next year comes…

title: Quantum Computing Holds The Missing Key To The Future of Artificial Intelligence
description: Key Findings The public believes AI has already peaked. Researchers quietly admit they’re hitting ceiling after ceiling. And now quantum physicists are stepping forward to say what almost nobody in Silicon Valley wants to acknowledge: artificial intelligence cannot reach its full evolutionary leap until it merges with quantum computation. By Samuel Lopez | USA Herald Google, ChatGPT and other AI platforms are reaching the limits of classical computing. Experts warn that true artificial intelligence breakthroughs will only emerge when AI fully merges with quantum computing. USA Herald’s Samuel Lopez explains why.
content:

Researchers quietly admit they’re hitting ceiling after ceiling.

title: Global Growth Faces Durability Risks Into 2026, UN Agency Says
description: World economic activity will remain “subdued” next year amid trade uncertainty and geopolitical tensions that are restraining investment outside of artificial intelligence and weighing on government finances, a UN agency predicted in a new report.
content:

title: Amazon Rushes Out Latest AI Chip To Take On Nvidia, Google
description: Amazon.com Inc.’s cloud unit raced to get the latest version of its artificial intelligence chip to market, renewing efforts to sell hardware capable of rivaling products from Nvidia Corp. and Google. The accelerator, called Trainium3, was recently installed in a few data centers and will be available for customers beginning on Tuesday, Dave Brown, a vice president with Amazon Web Services, said in an interview.

title: Legislation from Summer Lee, Democratic colleagues would combat discriminatory AI
